title: Anne Marie dresses as Billie Eilish with leg brace for Halloween
text:
Anne Marie dresses up as Billie Eilish (Picture: Rex / Backgrid)

Anne Marie has just gone and taken her Halloween outfit to a whole new level by dressing up as Billie Eilish.

In a spot the difference moment, the star took to Instagram ahead of the Kiss Haunted House Party, in London, where she showcased her look.

And the 28-year-old has nailed it.

Pouting down the lens, in true Billie style, the 22 hitmaker could be seen all dolled up in the star’s iconic green Chanel t-shirt, which she had matched with her fellow pop star’s statement skinny glasses and black bandana.

If you thought should couldn’t get any closer to the Bad Guy songstress, Anne even threw a leg brace in for good measure, and walked the red carpet on crutches.

It’s perfection and we are in love.

She completed the outfit with a leg brace (Picture: Rex)

Liam was Clark Kent (Picture: Backgrid)

He took his specs off to chat with press (Picture: Getty)

Despite the star stealing the show, Liam Payne also came close with his look as he decided to attend as Clark Kent, just before he transforms into Superman.

Advertisement

Advertisement

With thick black-rimmed glasses and an unbuttoned white shirt, the Strip That Down hitmaker showed off his superhero uniform underneath his smart attire.

He was joined by the likes of The Circle contestants, who are fresh from the game show after Paddy Smyth took home the £70,000.

Kady McDermott went as a ghoul (Picture: Getty)

Kem Cetinay took inspo from The Joker as a crazy clown (Picture: Getty Images)

Kem Cetiney took on a Joker inspired crazy clown look, and shared his costume on Instagram, saying: ‘Is it me or is it getting crazier out here?!’

Doing it for the girls, Georgina Elliot, Beth Dunlavey, Ella May and Brooke Derosiers arrived together looking like a spooky pop group.

Brooke had opted for the classic spooky policewoman look, while Ella won the show as she arrived as a pumpkin.

Sean Paul was in attendance as… himself? (Picture: Getty Images)

The Circle girls showed up in force (Picture: PA)

Lucie represented the Love Islanders (Picture: PA)

Yes, dressed in a sparkly orange dress, the 24-year-old looked incredible as she teamed her look with a bright green wig and faux fur coat.

Representing the Love Islanders, Lucie Donlan also made an appearance and she looked fab.

Wearing a red dress, which was pulled in by a corset, the reality star was a fortune teller and even had her crystal ball at hand.

Advertisement

Advertisement

She had gone to town with her makeup, with purple and silver eye shadow, which matched her black and silver nails.

It’s the sixth year that the party has happened, and will see an evening of live music from the likes of Stormzy, Sean Paul, Young T & Bugsey, Anne Marie and Liam Payne.

description: Anne Marie dresses up as Billie Eilish complete with leg brace as she joins A-listers at Kiss Haunted House Party.
